title: CUSAT Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 15 Security Guard Posts
description: Cochin University of Science and Technology (CUSAT) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 15 Security Guard Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 10th Pass can grab this chance and apply for the CUSAT Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the deadline of the applicati...
